videos.description: LSU's Marlon Taylor rises up for the powerful put-back dunk over Florida.
videos.headline: Taylor throws down vicious put-back dunk

videos.description: LSU's Naz Reid drives the lane and finishes with ferocious dunk.
videos.headline: Reid rises for one-handed throw down

videos.description: LSU's Naz Reid grabs his own miss before flushing it down over a Florida defender.
videos.headline: Reid goes off the backboard for towering dunk

videos.description: Naz Reid gets open and nails the open 3-pointer to tie the game.
videos.headline: Reid knocks down clutch 3-pointer to tie game

videos.description: Florida's Andrew Nembhard knocks down the clutch 3-pointer to push the Gators into the semifinals of the SEC tournament.
videos.headline: Nembhard hits game-winner to help Gators advance
